EmailTemplate.subject: Let Turbonomic Take You Out to the Giants Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re looking forward to an evening at AT&T Park filled with food, drinks, and of course baseball as the San Francisco Giants take on the Colorado Rockies. Will you join us with Cisco, Kovarus, and your technology peers on September 19th? San Francisco Giants vs Colorado Rockies <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
Where: AT&T Park 24 Willie Mays Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94107 Thursday, September 19th 7:12pm
<[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
